Package skills

Class RecipeBook

java.lang.Object
skills.RecipeBook
public class RecipeBook
extends Object
A simple recipe book singleton to store recipes
Author:
Marcel Engelmann

    • getInstance

      public static RecipeBook getInstance()
      Returns the current instance of the RecipeBook
      Returns:
      the current instance of the RecipeBook

    • addRecipe

      public void addRecipe​(String name, String[] ingredients, String[] instructions)
      Adds a new recipe
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the recipe
      ingredients - the required ingredients for the recipe
      instructions - the instructions to cook the recipe

    • addRecipe

      public void addRecipe​(Recipe recipe) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Adds a new recipe
      Parameters:
      recipe - the new recipe to add
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the recipe already exists

    • getRecipe

      public Recipe getRecipe​(String name)
      Returns a Recipe
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the recipe
      Returns:
      a Recipe or null, if the requested recipe could not be found

    • getRandomRecipeName

      public String getRandomRecipeName()
      Returns the name of a randomly selected Recipe
      Returns:
      the name of a randomly selected Recipe

    • getRecipesWithIngredients

      public List<Recipe> getRecipesWithIngredients​(String[] ingredients)
      Returns a List of recipes that are including the given ingredients
      Parameters:
      ingredients - the ingredients that the recipe must contain
      Returns:
      a List of recipes that are including the given ingredients
